mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member_withdraws_cash a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND `status` = 1 AND order_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM member_withdraws_cash WHERE del_flag = 0 AND uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT a.money, a.create_date createDate, a.`status` FROM member_withdraws_cash a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.members_uuid = #{membersUuid} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT SUM(c.money) withdraws FROM member_withdraws_cash c WHERE c.members_uuid = #{membersUuid} AND c.del_flag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE member_withdraws_cash a SET a.`status` = #{status}, a.modify_date = NOW(), a.modifier = #{memberUuid}, a.order_id = #{orderId}, a.version = a.version + 1 WHERE a.uuid = #{withdrawsUuid} AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.members_uuid = #{memberUuid} AND a.version = ${version}
